name: Kill Percy
description:
Kill Percy is a Shovel Knight fangame puzzler made in roughly 4 days where you must kill Percy in each of the levels.  There are 10 levels in total, and each of their themes is one of the levels from the original shovel knight.  Hope you enjoy.

I DO NOT OWN SHOVEL KNIGHT, IT IS OWNED BY YACHT CLUB GAMES, THIS IS SIMPLY A FAN CREATION.
